## Diabetes Cases in Lookback Period
```{r}
lookback_cpit2dm %>% 
  group_by(COHORT,CP) %>% 
  tally() %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from=CP,values_from=n) %>% 
  mutate(Total = CP1 + CP2 + CP3)
